verses.roman:
śyāma-cikkaṇa kānti, prakāṇḍa śarīra
sākṣāt kandarpa, yaiche mahā-malla-vīra

synonyms: śyāma—blackish; cikkaṇa—glossy; kānti—luster; prakāṇḍa—heavy; śarīra—body; sākṣāt—directly; kandarpa—Cupid; yaiche—like; mahā-malla—very stout and strong; vīra—hero.
translation: He had a glossy blackish complexion, and His tall, strong, heroic stature made Him seem like Cupid himself.
